review: I visited the clinic for severe toothache, on checking he found molar no.2 with a cavity and explained me options. When I was convinced I got myself prepared for root canal treatment. Entire procedure was carried out in 4 visits. I can now eat anything with my molar. Doctor is really trustworthy.

review:
I was apprehensive about going to a new dentist.
But after visiting Dr.Girish Shetake,I felt very comfortable due to his professional approach, a detailed clear explanation of the problem and solution,timeline and consequences .
There was punctuality and very approachable assistance too.
I was happy to find a good doctor and the treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
I went for treatment of my son (6y) and was worried due to his age and also due to pandemic. However clinic is effectively taking care pandemic associated issues by following all the WHO recommended precautionary measures. So from this angle, I was completely satisfied!

Dr Girish'skill and experience has made the procedure so easy for a kid that it was just like a story passing time and get it done with a smile on his face. Really grateful for Dr's professional skill, humble and kids-friendly attitude. I will surely visit in future for similar issues and wo recommend also.

review: My 4 year old son has Teeth pain due to cavity and whole in the teeth. Dr. Shetake treated the my son is very gently and nicely. Thank you Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is not friendly enough to console the patient during the time of the treatment. He is very rude sometimes. Have discontinued my treatmemt after two sittings. Won't recommended to anyone.
reply_text:
Firstly we apologize if we have offended you in any sense. As I remember you were treated in our 90 feet road clinic setup. Due to current lockdown policies , we cannot give enough time to patient after 7pm . If patient has anatomical difficulties to work inside mouth ,we have to apply few barriers and suction to complete the treatment.  For this we prefer daytime appointment .As u could not manage your appointment during day time, it was difficult for us to give enough consoling time during night appointments. 
Anyways as we have completed the root canal treatment , you can continue your treatment with other dentist . You can contact anytime if you need any case records . We ll be happy to see you in future .
 Again we are sorry to find you on negative side of our feedback portal.
